A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yeah\, this was not the best Star Wars movie ever.  If you have the ability to go see the movie on a \"special day\,\" i.e. $5 Tuesday make it happen\, it is worth seeing once on the big screen\, but not for full price.  You can read all the political and feminist blah blah blah posts\, but really I just didn't connect with the film.  I have seen every Star Wars film multiple times\, and while it has some characters I know\, I can't help but feel that this is some other film series that they are just making cameos in.  I will say I wouldn't want to be Rian Johnson at any fan function any time soon.
